game.name: Mazemerizzz2
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Color Alternatives, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: Moe is napping again and this time, it's a NIGHTMARE! The Watcher has Moe trapped in a massive endless maze filled with danger! Zombies, minotaurs and bone crushing, spikey, gaseous, flame filled traps. Equipped with just a torch, Moe must find a way to wake up.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Moe is napping again and this time, it's a NIGHTMARE! The Watcher has Moe trapped in a massive endless maze filled with danger! Zombies, minotaurs and bone crushing, spikey, gaseous, flame filled traps. Equipped with just a torch, Moe must find a way to wake up.
